title: Hereafter ensue certayne statut[es] and ordenau[n]ces of warre made ordeyned enacted [and] establysshed by the most noble victoryous, and moste Cristen prynce our moste drade soueraygne lorde Kynge Henry the. viij
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
publicationDate: the yere of oure lorde M.CCCCC. and. xiij. 1513]
publisher: Emprynted at the hyghe co[m]maundement of our soueraygne lorde the Kynge Henry the. viij. by Richarde Pynson, prynter vnto his noble grace,
notes: A revision of Henry VII's ordinances of 1491.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
